name: Beaver Coin
description: BEAVER is more than just a memecoin. It's movement! A rebellion against the monotony of traditional beaver life. It's about freedom, fun, and, of course, a little bit of chaos. I'm not like other beavers; there's so much more to life than just building dams. I've learned about blockchain, but I don't have the time to become a builder, so I'm taking a different path. Call me crazy, but the real secret is in the narrative.
